info.name: NL Design System Theme
info.summary: Apply Dutch government design tokens (NL Design System) to Nextcloud
info.description:
This app allows you to apply NL Design System design tokens to your Nextcloud instance.
Supported design token sets: - Rijkshuisstijl (Dutch national government) - Gemeente Utrecht - Gemeente Amsterdam - Gemeente Den Haag - Gemeente Rotterdam
Configure which token set to use in the admin settings.
info.author: Conduction
